util
Interface ConnectionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
Manager, TrafficGenerator
public interface ConnectionHandler

You need to implement this interface if you want to accept connections via ConnectionListener

Method Summary
 void onConnectionReceived(java.net.Socket newConnection, int receivedOn)
          Handles the new connection that has been received on a ServerSocket
 void onServerError(java.net.ServerSocket failedServer)
          Handles the ServerSocket which is accepting connections failing
 

Method Detail

onConnectionReceived

void onConnectionReceived(java.net.Socket newConnection,
                          int receivedOn)
Handles the new connection that has been received on a ServerSocket

Parameters:
newConnection - The connection which was just received
receivedOn - The port it was received on

onServerError

void onServerError(java.net.ServerSocket failedServer)
Handles the ServerSocket which is accepting connections failing

Parameters:
failedServer - The ServerSocket which failed
